name: GameDev Race
description:
You have been hired by a Game Studio to manage a team for 10 days. Your goal is to manage the team, so that together they can develop a game for Studio. The games that are completed will be published by Studio.

The game is a simulation of a Game Studio. During the game, you will need to make decisions that affect the team and the development of the game. It can be played alone, or with your friends via the Internet.

In the game you can:

- Choose a language;

- Enable or disable the sound;

- Choose the username;

- Connect to the game server;

- Create a room to play with your friends;

- Join an existing room;

After the match starts, you can:

- Change the position of the camera;

- Check the mood of the team;

- Check the money available to the team;

- Find out how much the team can develop daily;

- See how much the game is complete;

- Making choices related to the team and the game;

When the match is over, you will be able to check how much of the team's money is left, how much you managed to produce from the game with the team and how many games you managed to complete.
